metadata.name: AI Probability Demonstrator
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Ask probability questions in natural language and watch the AI demonstrate the answer with actual cards. Perfect for visual learners!

cards.note: Uses AI to demonstrate probability concepts visually with cards

instructions.overview: Type any probability question about playing cards and the AI will show you the relevant cards and explain the probability step-by-step at a 7th-grade level.
setup: Choose an AI model (Nova Micro is fastest)
Look at the example questions for inspiration
Type your own probability question in the text box
gameplay: Type a probability question (e.g., 'What is the probability of drawing a red card?')
Click 'Demonstrate' to let the AI process your question
Watch as relevant cards appear on screen
Click 'Try This Experiment' to run it yourself
instructions.winning: Learn by asking questions! Success means understanding probability concepts through visual demonstrations and clear explanations.
